page.description: Get all of the state variable information for the UX component.

return.name: stateData
return.description: Returns an & delimited list of name-value pairs.

page.discussion: Gets the data from the UX Component's 'state' object in the form of a string of name value pairs, delimited with & characters.

tip.p: If you want to read a value from the state object, you do NOT need to use this method. The value can be read directly from the state object. See example below.
